text: Hello. Originally an R and Python, would like to learn julia, any resources or courses anyone knows of?

elements.text: Hello. Originally an R and Python, would like to learn julia, any resources or courses anyone knows of?

text:
Here are some resources for a quick intro:
<https://cheatsheets.quantecon.org/>
<https://juliaacademy.com/>
<https://github.com/bkamins/The-Julia-Express>

The juliaacademy one includes some free mini-courses

text: And also my personal list of “lessons learned” transitioning to Julia from Matlab: <https://github.com/brenhinkeller/JuliaAdviceForMatlabProgrammers>

elements.text: And also my personal list of “lessons learned” transitioning to Julia from Matlab:

text: One key thing is that multiple dispatch really brings with it a whole new programming paradigm (“dispatch-oriented programming”?)

elements.text: One key thing is that multiple dispatch really brings with it a whole new programming paradigm (“dispatch-oriented programming”?)
